body: I like sometimes when doujinshi does good for the principal characters because the shipping between them is so pure, and ended rightfully, although their ages are different, but  real love has no boudaries, samething with deku and uraraka, hopefully waiting for them too in a rightfull doujinshi  too..
I hope we will have one with kisara in the future though this one is actually good.
I feel as though this doujin really does justice for Enju. The art is good, and the dialogue isn't bland.
